Original owner from 1964.  AO Bridgeport Mfg., late gen 3  Military Thompson (inspectors stamp on top left of receiver) with "L" sight, on form 5, marked ""US MODEL 1928A1" with one Bridgeport "L" drum. Original factory finish was blue.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Ruger Mini-14/30: 3-9x40AO Target Scope Kit with Lifetime Warranty !!
postcontent:
This Scope Kit Includes:
- 3~9x40MM VARIABLE POWER MINI-SCOPE with ADJUSTABLE OBJECTIVE -
- RUGER MINI-14/30 PICATINNY RAIL MOUNT -
- ONE INCH SCOPE RINGS -

$125.00 Includes Free Shipping in U.S.
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =
NO FIREARMS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS SALE !!
= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =

The Ruger Mini-14/30 Ranch rifle is a favorite with Western ranchers for protecting their cattle from coyotes and other predators during calving season. It is also popular with varmint hunters throughout the United States. However, the Ruger proprietary scope ring mounting system available for this rifle severely limits the choice of scopes that can be used and is very expensive to modify. Mini-scopes cannot be used with the Ruger proprietary mounting system and until recently, there were few mounts made that could accommodate mini-scopes on this rifle while still maintaining proper eye relief.

We have a unique Picatinny rail scope mount that attaches directly to the integral bases of this rifle and offers the versatility of using Weaver style rings to mount a scope in multiple positions forward or to the rear. This is an ideal mounting system for a mini-scope. 

We used this Picatinny rail system as the platform for a variable power 3-9x40MM mini-target scope. This scope has an adjustable objective lens to fine tune the parallex settings from 10 Yards to Infinity, a feature highly desired by serious target shooters shooting at known, fixed distances. Hunters shooting at distant small game targets will also find this feature advantageous in defining their target more clearly.

To use this scope for hunting, leave the power setting on 3x or 4x power and the parallex setting at infinity. If a close-in or moving target presents itself you are ready to shoot. If the target is at a longer range, increase the power to obtain a better sight picture. If you find a smaller, non-moving target, adjust the power ring for the optimum view and then adjust the objective ring until the target is in fine focus.

The mil-dot reticle can be used to estimate the range to your target and the smaller scope profile makes it easier to carry your mini-14/30 in the field or fit it into a scabbard or gun case.

SCOPE SCOPE SPECIFICATIONS:
+ Manufactured by AIM Sports
+ Magnification: 3X TO 9X Variable Power - Wide Angle
+ 40MM Objective Lens – Adjustable from 10 Yards to Infinity
+ Reticle: Range Estimating Mil-Dot
+ Eye Relief: 2 to 3 Inches
+ W&E: Target Turret Finger Adjust - 1 Click = 1/4” @100 Yards
+ Water Proof, Screw-On Aluminum Turret Caps to Protect the Finger Adjustment Knobs

title: For Sale/Trade:  1987 Honda Fourtrax TRX250X
location: south of Janesville in Beloit, WI, Janesville, Wisconsin
postcontent:
Reduced in price.  Straight from the first original line-up of Honda to replace the all-terrain 3-wheeler, the Fourtrax series of quad runners had some mighty big trail shoes to fill, but they did not disappoint, and this bad-boy trail racer was no exception. It might be “just” a 250cc, but this quad is NOT for the kids. The top end of the motor has been bored for that extra “pop” in speed, and this racer jumps off the starting line better than most new models,....... you won't be disappointed.

This machine has been ridden hard, but has also been maintained with genuine Honda OEM mechanical parts, and regular oil and air filter changes. It has never been sunk in the mud or wrecked. The frame is in perfect condition, and there are no fluid leaks from the motor or mechanics.

 In the last 300 miles of riding and in addition to the minor maintenance, it has also had: a carburetor rebuild and tank flush; new drive sprocket and cover, drive chain, tension pad and rear axle sprocket replacement; the rear end was rebuilt with fresh bearings, grease and seals; a new skid plate and rear brake disc and pads were installed; the mono-shock was replaced; the front wheel bearings were cleaned and freshly repacked; the brake fluid was drained and fresh fluid put in; new rear aftermarket body plastic was installed; rear and then front racks were added.

 In addition, I have the stuff but haven’t gotten around to installing yet: a rear tow hitch; a new front light/ignition key housing; a new control switch cluster; new vinyl for the seat. I am also including the helmet with 3/4 flip visor, gas tank saddlebags, owners’ service manual, a spare grip, and some older parts like an air filter for high-dust riding, the last drive chain for spare links, and some other miscellaneous items.

 I will accept cash or certified cashier’s check; absolutely no personal checks. I’m asking $1,600 with all the new parts, and the fact that Honda's are ultra-reliable as long as they are taken care of. You will have a better chance of negotiating price if you have cash, although I may be interested in trading.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Umarex H&k HK 416 D .22lr HV Tactical AR Style Carbine Walther Trade For MPA Masterpiece Mac Style 9mm Pistol Or?
postcontent:
Wife bought this for me on Valentines day last year for about $640 from big 5. Nothing says love like a deadly weapon. Took it camping a few times and have fired exactly 60 rounds through it. Quality product so as expected it had no issues. 

 Came with the 10 round magazine and we bought an additional 20. Comes with everything shown in the photos. Rifle in original box, 1-10 round and 1-20 round magazine. the original stupid cable lock still in its bag. I can't seem to find the manual for it but it is available online. 

 Rifle has been in and out of the safe a few times and out in the woods. Has some small handling marks on it. Most noticeable is a paint scratch on the top of the barrel as seen in the photo. 

 I looked at some of the ar style .22 rifles and have to say this one was in my opinion the best. The weight is substantial. Hold this in one hand and the Mossberg or Colt version in the other and you will see what I mean. This is metal and solid. A great trainer.

 I am looking to trade this more than sell it. I have specific trade desires and am not in a hurry to get rid of this .22. Original receipt in hand shows 649.99 on sale from 750. Too much I know but I really liked it. Now I want a Masterpiece Arms M10 or M11 pistol in 9mm. Would like one with its factory accessories and case if possible but am flexible.

 Would meet face to face anywhere between Lynnwood and Arlington Have a preprinted Bill of sale we can fill out for each of our records.

 From Manufacturer:
 The .22 caliber HK 416 is loaded with authentic features. From its appearance, feel, and operation, right down to the sling swivel incorporated into the stock, the 416 D145RS is a replica in every sense.

 Like all the .22 LR H&K's, the 416 is a dedicated .22 rimfire rifle. It is engineered and built in Germany by Carl Walther with a match grade precision barrel, upper and lower metal receivers, a retractable stock, and a machined rail interface system. The 416’s pistol grip and buttstock are authentic in that they include storage compartments for small tools or batteries.

 The magazines for the .22 caliber 416 are made of high-strength polymer and are designed to make loading simple and efficient. They’re available in either a 20- or 10-round version. 

 The .22 caliber HK 416 D145RS operates on a blowback system. The dust cover functions and the bolt holds open when the magazine empties. Its sights are on-rail and the rear sight is adjustable for windage and elevation. Its safety selector rotates 90 degrees from ‘On Safe’ to ‘Fire’. Take down for basic cleaning is simple—there are no loose parts. Just remove the rear receiver pin and pivot the upper receiver to open.

title: For Sale:  for sale
postcontent:
NIB Dan Wesson Specialist 1911 .45ACP w/ (2) 8 Round Mags with Bump pads NS Matte black Duty finish. NO CREDIT CARD FEES. READ OUR FEEDBACK AND BID WITH CONFIDENCE.


We recently had police departments and special units who carry the 1911 approach us to build them a more reliable and durable 1911 to replace their current carry pieces. Since we did not have a model to meet their specific needs, we created the Specialist just for them. Knowing our customers the way we do, we knew we had to offer these to the public as well.

The Specialist is a 5” 1911 chambered in .45 ACP that is full of features to satisfy an officer’s special needs.

Starting at the top, the slide wears our popular Clark Style serrated rib and like all of our guns with night sights, the Specialist wears dual-colored Tritium night sights. The rear sight is our new tactical ledge rear sight with single amber tritium dot and the front utilizes a green lamp with white target ring.

The forged slide is mated to our new forged tactical rail frame. The frame utilizes the standard 1913 picatinny rail and features 25 LPI front strap checkering, undercut trigger guard and a recessed slide stop for use with laser grips (not included) and tactical operations. Each Specialist comes standard with our ambidextrous thumb safety, extended magazine release and a detachable two-piece magwell. This duty-ready piece comes dressed with a set of awesome G10 VZ Operator II grips and two 8 round magazines with bump pads.

The Specialist is available in either a matte stainless finish or our matte black Duty finish.

We think this pistol would not only be perfect for duty and tactical purposes but for home defense as well. Check out the Specialist and see if it fits the bill for your needs.


*FOUR PEAKS ARMORY CARRIES A WIDE VARIETY OF ACCESSORIES AS WELL, SO IF YOU NEED IT KITTED A CERTAIN WAY JUST LET US KNOW. WE AIM TO PLEASE!


All items listed by Four Peaks Armory are new in factory box/packaging, unless specifically stated otherwise.

Four Peaks Armory prides itself on same day shipping when possible upon receipt of the buyer’s local FFL. All items sold are shipped ASAP.

If the photographs shown do not appear to be "stock" photographs or standard images provided by the manufacturer, the item(s) shown is the actual item for sale, unless stated otherwise. However, because of the lighting used, some surfaces may appear to be lighter in color due to glare/reflections.

We accept the following forms of payment: certified checks, USPS money order, personal checks, and credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Discover, and American Express). NO CREDIT CARD FEES! Personal checks must be cleared before item is shipped.

A sales tax of 8.05% is collected for buyers who are Arizona residents.

Firearms must be shipped to a FFL dealer.

WE SHIP TO CALIFORNIA. However, it’s the buyer’s responsibility to ensure that the firearm being purchased is on the roster prior to purchase. For other states subject to magazine restrictions, we also ship without magazines upon request.

No international shipments.

Unless specifically requested by winning bidder, items will be shipped with insurance.

Some states, such as Hawaii, Illinois, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Jersey, New York, and Ohio, have restrictions on firearm-related items (e.g., magazine capacities). It is the buyer's responsibility to know the pertinent laws of his/her state of residence, as well as any additional restrictions imposed by his/her country and city of residence.

Four Peaks Armory can not be held liable and/or responsible for any physical injury, death and/or property damage resulting directly and/or indirectly from either intentional and/or unintentional discharge of firearms due to, for example, improper handling or malfunction of firearms, parts, accessories, and/or ammunition.

Returns are only accepted if the item received is different from that described in the description.

Four Peaks Armory reserves the right to end auctions prior to any bids, which meet the described opening/minimum bid, being placed.

Model: XDS
Action: Semi-automatic

SAFETY

Like all of models in our XD® line, the XD-S™ has all of the safety features to ensure your safety and the safety of those around you while handling the pistol.

Ultra Safety Assurance (USA)
Trigger System™
The USA Trigger System™ guards against accidental discharge, from dropping or bumping it, by locking the trigger in place until direct rearward pressure is applied.

Loaded Chamber Indicator
The Loaded Chamber Indicator allows the shooter to verify without a doubt, visually or by touch, that there is a round in the chamber.

Grip Safety
All XD®, XD(M)® and XD-S™ models allows firing only when the shooter has a firm grip on the pistol.

Fail-Safe Disassembly
The XD-S™ disassembles just like the XD®, however, with the XD-S™, the disassembly lever cannot be manipulated with a magazine in the pistol. Additionally, when the disassembly lever is up, a magazine cannot be inserted into the pistol.

Secure Grip Texture
The “all-terrain” look of the XD(M)® has proven to work so well that the texture has been enhanced for the XD-S™ with an even more pronounced texture to ensure your grip is always secure.

Melonite® Finish and Carrying Case
To preserve the safety and quality of your pistol, we’ve added a Melonite® finish on all XD® models for a deep penetrating finish that protects against corrosion. Also, our rugged case is as durable as the XD-S™ trademark it carries.

ERGONOMIC

Superior design features give the XD-S™ capabilities that not all pistols of its size can claim. Making the XD-S™ easy and comfortable to fire is one the highest priorities of the XD® line. Many characteristics of the XD-S™ model are especially beneficial to those with a concealed carry license, like the less bulky frame and ability to customize the grip.

Picatinny Rail System
A single-position Picatinny rail readily accepts lights, lasers or other pistol accessories. It is one of the only polymer pistols of this size that has this feature, which makes it an easy reach for the light or laser of your choice.

Short Reset Trigger
The new XD-S™ trigger has a short travel along with a short reset which helps to keep you on target with greater ease for quicker, more accurate follow-up shots.

Snag Free Sights
The rear sight on the XD-S™ is low-profile and holster friendly. Easier and faster target acquisition is achieved with a fiber optic front sight.

Making the XD-S™ easy and comfortable to fire is one the highest priorities of the XD® line. Many characteristics of the XD-S™ model are especially beneficial to those with a concealed carry license, like the less bulky frame and ability to customize the grip.

Mould-Tru Backstraps
With two interchangeable backstraps, Springfield Armory® has stayed true to their focus on providing the user with the most comfortable, and easy to point pistol possible by allowing you to custom fit your grip.

Slim Contour Frame
The ideal grip angle of the XD-S™ is accented by the 1” single stack frame.

Sure Grasp Slide Serrations
The serrations on the XD-S™ not only make this firearm more attractive, they are functional. The slightly rounded design, extending to the top of the slide, limits the possibility of a snag when drawing the pistol.

This rifle is amazingly accurate and blows away the Ruger 10/22 it was cloned after. Cycles perfectly with no hangups. 18" bull Barrel. It comes with a Tasco Supercon Omni-view 3-9 x 40 scope. The iron sights are in place. 1 original 25 round magazines. Takes all Ruger 10/22 magazines. Email for more photos. It is completely stock and has no scratches. The rifling is perfect. It is possible that there is a cap at the bottom of pistol grip that is missing. I have no way to verify if there was one there that has gone missing.

I'm only asking for what I have into it. I also have a hard case for it for another $20.00. I will ship to your FFL at  your expense for my cost.

This from Wikipedia:
The AMT Lightning 25/22 was a .22LR-caliber semi-automatic rifle manufactured by Arcadia Machine & Tool (AMT).
As is alluded to in the nomenclature, the Lightning 25/22 is functionally a clone of the Ruger 10/22 with the substitution of a larger 25-round magazine instead of the 10-round magazine used by Ruger. Also, the receiver is stainless steel rather than aluminum and features a Stainless Steel and Nylon folding stock and pistol grip rather than the wooden stock mounted on the 10/22.
The AMT Lightning line, which included direct clones of the Ruger 10/22 and Mark II pistol, eventually prompted a lawsuit against AMT that forced them to discontinue the line.
The AMT Lightning was also exported to the UK and tuned by Theoben Engineering, the result was the AMT/Theoben Target Model. This rifle is known for its reliability; accuracy and rarity. Produced in very small numbers this rifle had a bull target barrel and a special evolution moderator to fit the larger barrel (.917). Many have suggested this rifle remains the most accurate factory finished semi-automatic ever produced and is a credit to the Anglo-American alliance of AMT and Theoben.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Indiana Deer Legal Remington Model 700  350 JR
postcontent:
Two years ago it was illegal to hunt in Indiana with a rifle like this.
 Last year Indiana changed the casing length to 1.8 inches.  I have a gunsmith
 CF Gunworks LLC  that took  the 350 Remington Magnum  and shortened that casing to 1.8 inches
 Which is what this cartridge now is. You can’t  buy this ammo or the gun ,they 
 have to be custom made which is why they are expensive. The .357 and .44 magnums are just another example of Indiana Deer Legal cartridges that you can use. This is a High Powered Rifle that has been modified to meet Indiana specs and requirements . This rifle is 100 % legal to hunt with in Indiana .
Don’t wait for Deer season to decide you want one, you won’t be able to. This is someone’s chance to own
a very nice Indiana Deer Legal High Powered Rifle of which only a hand full are available.

I have a custom built Remington Model 700 That was a 350 Remington Magnum
it has been shortened to 1.8 inch. Indiana Deer Legal casing
the factory barrel has been bedded and set back to shorten the chamber.
It comes with Redding Dies that have been ground to match. 
I have brass and about 30rds of ammo that was made by C F Gunworks.
It is toped off with a leupold 3x9.
This rifle killed 3 deer at over 300yds this past season. It is amazing!!
I would like $1800 with scope or $1600 without.

This Rifle was custom built to Indiana Specs!!!!! And is referred to as a 350 JR
 This cartridge is modeled after the Remington 350 Magnum. They shorten the case
 to 1.8 inches, I took a picture so you can see the cartridge, bullet is 200grn
and clearly meets Indiana guide lines. I hope this helps with the confusion. 
Certain rifles like the .357 magnum or .44 magnum can be bought at walmart
and are perfectly legal. Indiana says you can't go below .357 magnum. This rifle can't
be bought at WalMart they have to be custom made which the price reflects

title: For Sale:  Taurus 608,  .357 Mag, 8-shot, 4", stainless, LNIB
location: W-S, near Old Salisbury & Clemmonsville Rd, Winston Salem, North Carolina
postcontent:
I bought this a month ago because I wanted to get into a .357 Mag & was tired of waiting for a good deal on a used GP100 or 686.  I have fired exactly 1 box of .357 mag ammo thru it and no .38's.  There is absolutely nothing wrong with this gun but I came across a 6" GP100 that I'd rather have & no need for 2 .357 wheel guns for me.

Lockup is very tight on every cylinder.  Timing is perfect.  Cylinder to bore gap is good - I haven't measured with a feeler gage but a thin business card barely fits with some wiggling.  Trigger is excellent in both SA & DA.  Finish is a peened stainless, barrel is ported, and it holds 8 rounds.

In factory box with everything that came with it.  No accessories like holster or speed loader.  

Absolutely nothing wrong with this gun that I could tell from 1 range trip & 50 rds.  Went bang every time & grouped very nicely @ 15 yds with 158gr JSP American Eagle ammo.

Price is firm.  $500 is very fair in my opinion because that's less than you can get it new esp without tax or shipping+ FFL x-fer fee.  MSRP is $688 & discount retail on these is about $540 + tax.  I'll show you original receipt from last month from a discount FFL & you'll see it's a bargain when you come to check it out.  I'm not selling to get out of a broken or crappy gun.  I found what I really wanted originally at a great price or else I'd be hanging on to this one & shooting it frequently.

Not looking for much in the way of trades.  I'd take in trade/partial trade for the following only:

NIB AR-15 complete upper.  Complete from a reputable, well-known manufacturer.
Excellent condition (minty) Sig P220, P226 or 1911 Max, STX, Nightmare, or Scorpion
Excellent condition (minty) Kimber CDP or higher Kimber line 1911
New/like new Nikon Monarch 3 6-24x50 w/ SF
New/like new Aimpoint T1 on a LaRue 660 or 751
Very little else I'd want in trade - no hunting rifles, shotguns, other wheel guns, or ammo.

You don't need to email me asking "IS THIS STILL AVAILABLE?" If you're reading this, it is.  You also don't need to email me asking "WILL YOU TAKE ANY LESS FOR IT?" I won't.  Bill of sale + CCW or PPP

title: For Sale:  Remington R-15™ VTR™ Predator Carbine CS .223
postcontent:
PRICE CHANGE - "Remington AR-15 style Model R-15 VTR Predator". Purchased for Coyote hunting, but never went due to bad heath. 72 years old. Just sighted in at Belton Gun Club. Has Barska 10 x 40 Power x 50 Scope with Red Lighted Mil-Dot Reticle. Green Long Range Tac-Llite [300 yards] Scope and Magazine are hand camo'd with 3M Viny to match gun which was factory camo'd. [see photos below]. ls deadly accurate at 300 Yards, probably much farther. An unrivaled combination of precision accuracy, blazing-fast follow-ups and hunt-specific features. The new R-15 VTR™ modular repeating rifle was born of the most advanced design aspects of AR-15-style rifles available today with a strong emphasis on optimizing form and functionality for the modern predator aficionado. For peak accuracy, the R-15’s 0.680" OD barrel is precision-crafted from ChroMoly steel. It’s free-floated within the machined-aluminum fore-end tube and given a recessed hunting crown to ensure gasses escape evenly around the bullet for the ultimate in shot-to-shot consistency. Six longitudinal flutes forward of the gas block promote rapid barrel cooling and increase rigidity while reducing weight, further contributing to this rifle’s ability to print tiny clusters at an incredible pace.

And our new hunting single-stage trigger design is as cleanbreaking as they come. Whether you choose the 223 Remington or 204 Ruger version, the semi-automatic gas action all but eliminates muzzle jump and recoil so your target remains in the crosshairs. And when it’s time to add optics, the receiver-length Picatinny rail makes it a rock-solid cinch.

Control comes naturally with the ergonomic pistol grip and lightweight overall design of the R-15. Its uppers and lowers are machined from aluminum forgings for featherweight durability, and the fore-end tube is drilled and tapped for accessory rails. This new family of firearms consists of three models. Each was designed with input from leading predator authorities and decked in the ultra-effective Advantage® MAX-1 HD™ camouflage to blend with sage, open country and a multitude of hunting terrains. All come with five-round magazines and are compatible with all aftermarket AR-15 magazines and other accessories.

The R-15 VTR Predator Rifle has a 22" barrel with a fixed stock and pistol grip. At 7 3/4 lbs, it’s extremely stable – the best choice for long shots. Our R-15 VTR Predator Carbine and R-15 Predator Carbine CS* (Collapsible Stock) handle like lightning with their 18" barrels and weigh a mere 6 3/4 lbs. – perfect for high-speed hunting scenarios. The Predator Carbine CS features a telescoping stock with a fully adjustable length of pull for a custom fit.
Key Features:

New semi-automatic AR-15-style rifle developed with the predator hunter in mind
Free-floating button-rifled 0.680" Muzzle OD ChroMoly barrels with recessed hunting crown for superior accuracy
Fluted barrel design reduces weight and promotes rapid barrel cooling
Clean-breaking single-stage hunting trigger
Receiver-length Picatinny rail for adding optics
Ergonomic pistol grip
Fore-end tube drilled and tapped for accessory rails
Full Advantage® MAX-1 HD™ coverage
Includes 5-round magazine
Legal for hunting in most states
Compatible with aftermarket AR-15 magazines
